mapper.select: SELECT d.o_num AS "oNum", p.p_name AS "pName", p.p_price AS "pPrice", d.d_buy AS "dBuy", ot.o_status AS "oStatus", d.d_num AS "dNum", k.k_name AS "kName" FROM detail d JOIN product p ON d.p_num = p.p_num JOIN order_t ot ON d.o_num = ot.o_num JOIN kakao_m k ON ot.k_num = k.k_num WHERE ot.k_num = #{kNum} ORDER BY ot.o_dt DESC
